sentences.english: What if I saw myself as perfect?
sentences.chinese: 假如我已經將自己看作完美的呢？

sentences.english: If be the fade of little scope only, so complete and OK oneself are its complementary color .
sentences.chinese: 假如只是小範圍的掉色，那麼完全可以自己爲它補色。

sentences.english: How beautiful maleness is, if it finds its right expression.
sentences.chinese: 雄性是多美啊，假如它發現它正確的表達方式。

sentences.english: If chance, by lonely contemplation led.
sentences.chinese: 假如在幽思的引導下，偶然有緣分。

sentences.english: Please leave a message if I won't be there.
If one twin pushes, will the other push back?
sentences.chinese: 假如一個雙胞胎推擠，另一個會不會推回去？

sentences.english: We shall place a trial order with you for 80 cases of Black Tea if your price is workable.
sentences.chinese: 假如你方價格可行，我們將向你方試購80箱紅茶。

sentences.english: How much wood would a woodchuck chuck.
If do not think company of outfit allowing the home is made, buy off-the-peg cloakroom pretty good also.
sentences.chinese: 假如不想讓家裝公司製作，買現成的衣帽間也不錯。

sentences.english: I couldn't go to sleep without getting something off my chest.
sentences.chinese: 我假如不將心事一吐爲快就睡不着。

sentences.english: What if she oversleeps and misses the bus?
sentences.chinese: 假如她睡過頭錯過班車怎麼辦？

sentences.english: Without some dissimulation no business can be carried on at all.
sentences.chinese: 假如沒有掩飾，沒有任何商業活動可以進行。

sentences.english: How do you think you would react if you were Xiaohua?
sentences.chinese: 假如你是小華，你認爲你會有何反應呢？

sentences.english: The 'what if' device is often facile, rarely convincing.
sentences.chinese: “假如”式分析方法常常是膚淺的，很少有說服力。

sentences.english: Whenever you need money, send me words three weeks ahead.
sentences.chinese: 無論何時假如你需要錢，請於三星期前來信關照。

sentences.english: If there were no air and water, no living thing could live.
sentences.chinese: 假如沒有空氣跟水，沒有生物能夠生存。

definition: like that/in that way/or so/so/so very much/about/in that case
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
